2. It is reported that you are remaining absent without leave or permission and have failed to communicate your whereabouts to the office.
3 We are unable to contact you on telephone as the number furnished by you are false/notreachable.
4 You are advised to report to {{doc.location}} office by {{frappe.utils.formatdate(frappe.utils.add_days(frappe.utils.today(), 10), 'dd-MMM-YYYY')}} failing which it will be assumed that you are not interested to continue service in our organization.



Thanking you,




For SECURITY & PERSONNEL SERVICES PVT. LTD.



Authorized Signatory
name: Absconding from duty
